userStories.question: Whatâ€™s your best coping strategy?
userStories.tip: I take my emergency meds with me everywhere, no matter where I'm going or for how long.

userStories.question: Besides medications, what else has worked for you?
userStories.tip: Nothing. Seriously, get meds or oxygen tanks or SOMETHING. You don't have to tough this crap out.

userStories.question: What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?
userStories.tip: Good luck, buddy. It's a hard condition to have, but you're strong just for getting through.

carousel_items: Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Interacts with grapefruit and the cholesterol medicine Simvastatin.
Don't drink too much alcohol while taking this medicine.
Your doctor might do routine blood tests to check your liver function.

basics.benefits_moa: Verapamil is a calcium channel blocker. It lowers blood pressure by slowing your heart rate and relaxing your blood vessels. Your heart gets more oxygen and doesn't have to work as hard to pump, which can relieve chest pain.
basics.bottom_line: Verapamil works well to lower blood pressure and prevent chest pain, but you have to be okay with avoiding alcohol. You can't miss doses, and you might get persistent swelling.
downsides: Calcium channel blockers can cause swelling in your limbs. If this happens for you, it probably won't get better over time, so talk to your doctor about alternatives if it bothers you.
Women are more likely to have side effects (especially swelling) from Verapamil than men.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Verapamil suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Not a good medication for you if you drink alcohol.

downsides_processed.orig: Calcium channel blockers can cause swelling in your limbs. If this happens for you, it probably won't get better over time, so talk to your doctor about alternatives if it bothers you.
Women are more likely to have side effects (especially swelling) from Verapamil than men.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Verapamil suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Not a good medication for you if you drink alcohol.

upsides: A first-choice blood pressure treatment for many people.
Calcium channel blockers work especially well for African Americans to lower blood pressure.
You can take it alone or with other medicines to help lower blood pressure.
Lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Prevents heart-related chest pain (angina) if you take it regularly.

upsides_processed.orig: A first-choice blood pressure treatment for many people.
Calcium channel blockers work especially well for African Americans to lower blood pressure.
You can take it alone or with other medicines to help lower blood pressure.
Lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Prevents heart-related chest pain (angina) if you take it regularly.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and controls heart rate.

userStories.tip: Can't take it on an empty stomach

drugs.name: Calan

labeled_indications.indication: Abnormal heart rhythm prevention and treatment

carousel_items_processed.orig: Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Interacts with grapefruit and the cholesterol medicine Simvastatin.
Don't drink too much alcohol while taking this medicine.
Your doctor might do routine blood tests to check your liver function.

risks_warnings.title: Heart failure
risks_warnings.description: Reports of heart failure or pulmonary edema (increased fluid in the lungs) have been reported. If your doctor feels that Verapamil will work for you, they will work with you to control the issues with your heart before starting Verapamil.

description_processed.orig: Reports of heart failure or pulmonary edema (increased fluid in the lungs) have been reported. If your doctor feels that Verapamil will work for you, they will work with you to control the issues with your heart before starting Verapamil.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: You may experience sudden drops in blood pressure while on Verapamil, which may cause dizziness. Be careful when getting up from either a seated or lying down position to prevent falls.

description_processed.orig: You may experience sudden drops in blood pressure while on Verapamil, which may cause dizziness. Be careful when getting up from either a seated or lying down position to prevent falls.

risks_warnings.title: Elevated liver enzymes
risks_warnings.description: Your doctor may check your liver regularly, as there have been reports of liver damage which can only be seen through blood tests. If you do have a history of liver disease, let your doctor know.

description_processed.orig: Your doctor may check your liver regularly, as there have been reports of liver damage which can only be seen through blood tests. If you do have a history of liver disease, let your doctor know.

risks_warnings.title: Heart rhythm problems
risks_warnings.description: Your doctor may monitor your heart to see if changes to its electrical system may occur, especially if you have had liver or kidney disease in the past.

description_processed.orig: Your doctor may monitor your heart to see if changes to its electrical system may occur, especially if you have had liver or kidney disease in the past.

points.name: Constipation
points.hlt: gastrointestinal atonic and hypomotility disorders nec

carousel_items: Take it as soon as your headache starts.
If you use the nasal spray, be sure to blow your nose before using it.
If you use the patch, put it on a dry area free of scars, tattoos, or other cuts and scrapes. Be sure to press the button to activate it.
If you use the injection, you can use a second injection if you still have a headache after an hour. If you have symptoms 2 hours after the injection, switch to the pill version.
Sumatriptan can make you drowsy, so avoid activities that need you to be fully alert until you know how it affects you.
Lie down in a dark room after taking Sumatriptan to help ease the pain.

basics.benefits_moa: Sumatriptan is a triptan medication that treats migraine headaches. It releases serotonin, which lowers the inflammation that causes headaches.
basics.bottom_line: Sumatriptan is an excellent choice for acute migraine relief, but you might need another medication to prevent headaches.
downsides: The oral and nasal versions of Sumatriptan have an unpleasant after-taste.
Does not prevent migraine headaches; it only treats them once they start.
Must wait 1 hour before using second injection.
Can cause rebound (more) headaches if Sumatriptan is used too often.
Need to have your blood pressure checked often, especially if you're pregnant.

downsides_processed.orig: The oral and nasal versions of Sumatriptan have an unpleasant after-taste.
Does not prevent migraine headaches; it only treats them once they start.
Must wait 1 hour before using second injection.
Can cause rebound (more) headaches if Sumatriptan is used too often.
Need to have your blood pressure checked often, especially if you're pregnant.

upsides: Comes in several forms. Ask your doctor if you should use the pill, nasal spray, patch, or injection.
A combination of forms can be used if symptoms do not improve.
The nasal spray and injectable forms work very quickly.
It's generally safe to use if you are pregnant.
Comes in a generic form, so it can be pretty cheap.

upsides_processed.orig: Comes in several forms. Ask your doctor if you should use the pill, nasal spray, patch, or injection.
A combination of forms can be used if symptoms do not improve.
The nasal spray and injectable forms work very quickly.
It's generally safe to use if you are pregnant.
Comes in a generic form, so it can be pretty cheap.

userStories.tip: Be sure to take with full glass of liquid. Dries you out.
I always carry some in my bag just in case and take it as soon as I feel the migraine is coming. Couldn't live without it!
need to take it WAY before onset of migraine
Take sumatriptan at the first sign of migraine pain and it will work every time. Don't hesitate.

userStories.identifier: Average sized male in decent health
userStories.tip: Taking the recommended dose of sumatriptan makes me feel very tired and worn out, for at least several hours. However, it is much better than a full migraine, which, for me, involves between about 10-20 hours of intense pain.

drugs.name: Imitrex

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take it as soon as your headache starts.
If you use the nasal spray, be sure to blow your nose before using it.
If you use the patch, put it on a dry area free of scars, tattoos, or other cuts and scrapes. Be sure to press the button to activate it.
If you use the injection, you can use a second injection if you still have a headache after an hour. If you have symptoms 2 hours after the injection, switch to the pill version.
Sumatriptan can make you drowsy, so avoid activities that need you to be fully alert until you know how it affects you.
Lie down in a dark room after taking Sumatriptan to help ease the pain.

risks_warnings.title: Tightening of blood vessels (myocardial angina, ischemia, or infarction)
risks_warnings.description: Some people taking Sumatriptan have reported temporary chest pain, pressure, and tightness. These symptoms are caused by heart vessels being constricted/tightened. Before starting Sumatriptan, people who have coronary artery disease, or are more likely to have it, should talk to their doctor about having a heart health assessment.

description_processed.orig: Some people taking Sumatriptan have reported temporary chest pain, pressure, and tightness. These symptoms are caused by heart vessels being constricted/tightened. Before starting Sumatriptan, people who have coronary artery disease, or are more likely to have it, should talk to their doctor about having a heart health assessment.

risks_warnings.title: Stroke
risks_warnings.description: Taking Sumatriptan can also increase your chances of a stroke. If you have a history of cardiovascular disease (including previous heart attack, stroke, fast/uncontrolled heart rate, or irregular heartbeat), talk to your doctor before starting Sumatriptan.

description_processed.orig: Taking Sumatriptan can also increase your chances of a stroke. If you have a history of cardiovascular disease (including previous heart attack, stroke, fast/uncontrolled heart rate, or irregular heartbeat), talk to your doctor before starting Sumatriptan.

risks_warnings.title: Stomach bleeding
risks_warnings.description: Taking Sumatriptan can cause a constriction of the blood vessels in your digestive tract. If you have unusual stomach pain or bloody diarrhea while taking Sumatriptan, be sure to seek medical attention.

description_processed.orig: Taking Sumatriptan can cause a constriction of the blood vessels in your digestive tract. If you have unusual stomach pain or bloody diarrhea while taking Sumatriptan, be sure to seek medical attention.

risks_warnings.title: Serotonin syndrome
risks_warnings.description: Taking Sumatriptan along with medications used for your mood, such as monoamine oxidase inhibitors and certain antidepressants, can make you more likely to have a serious condition called serotonin syndrome. Symptoms include sudden changes in your mental status (confusion and hallucinations), muscles (tremors and rigidity), and nausea or diarrhea. Go to the emergency room or talk to your doctor immediately if you notice these symptoms. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist if you are unsure if your other medications will interact with Sumatriptan.

description_processed.orig: Taking Sumatriptan along with medications used for your mood, such as monoamine oxidase inhibitors and certain antidepressants, can make you more likely to have a serious condition called serotonin syndrome. Symptoms include sudden changes in your mental status (confusion and hallucinations), muscles (tremors and rigidity), and nausea or diarrhea. Go to the emergency room or talk to your doctor immediately if you notice these symptoms. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist if you are unsure if your other medications will interact with Sumatriptan.

risks_warnings.title: High blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: Sumatriptan works by narrowing the blood vessels. It can cause or worsen high blood pressure. If you feel dizzy or have a headache that won't go away, Sumatriptan may not be the best option for you.

description_processed.orig: Sumatriptan works by narrowing the blood vessels. It can cause or worsen high blood pressure. If you feel dizzy or have a headache that won't go away, Sumatriptan may not be the best option for you.

risks_warnings.title: Seizures
risks_warnings.description: Sumatriptan can lower the brain's threshold for seizures in people with certain risk factors. Seizures can make a person shake uncontrollably for a few seconds and zone out. Get medical help right away if you notice this.

description_processed.orig: Sumatriptan can lower the brain's threshold for seizures in people with certain risk factors. Seizures can make a person shake uncontrollably for a few seconds and zone out. Get medical help right away if you notice this.

carousel_items: For the first week, avoid activities that require you to be alert.
Can cause tingling skin sensations and reduced appetite.
Report any confusion, decreased sweating, fever, or changes in behavior or vision.
Takes 3 to 4 weeks to feel full effects on mood.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Topamax is an antiepileptic. Researchers don't know exactly how it works, but it seems to affect multiple parts of the brain to control seizures and migraines.
basics.bottom_line: Topamax is useful for preventing seizures and migraines, and doesn't require blood tests while you're on it.
downsides: Can cause sleepiness, speech problems, tingling sensations, and weight loss.
A few people will get kidney stones.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

downsides_processed.orig: Can cause sleepiness, speech problems, tingling sensations, and weight loss.
A few people will get kidney stones.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

upsides: Used on its own or with other antiepileptic medicines to lower the frequency of seizures, especially for people with tonic-clonic or partial seizures, or Lennox-Gestaut syndrome.
Helpful in preventing frequent migraine headaches.

upsides_processed.orig: Used on its own or with other antiepileptic medicines to lower the frequency of seizures, especially for people with tonic-clonic or partial seizures, or Lennox-Gestaut syndrome.
Helpful in preventing frequent migraine headaches.

userStories.tip: Went from 4-5 migraines a week to 1-2 a month.  Have the tingling and did experiencing weight loss; tingling in feet comes and goes, never completely gone for years now.  Overall would take the 'pins and needles' over a migraine.

userStories.identifier: full time employee, part time student
userStories.tip: Caused abdominal pain, diarrhea and weight loss for the first month.  Caused cognitive problems - couldn't concentrate and would completely blank on certain words, specifically names.
This works better than any of the anti-depressants I've tried (even though they're not in the same category) and the weight loss is a nice bonus!

Taken for 3 years & have finally found the best balance of keeping my old 400mg daily dosage but split up twice a day (morning & night) to avoid the dreaded "DOPE-A-MAX" as my Doctor hilariously calls the word finding brain fog side effect.

Still get migraines but they're tolerable headaches usually and don't even require pain meds. Tingling subsided after a couple of months. Minor brain fog worth the migraine abatement. Don't mind the weight loss either.

I really took for bipolar but helps w sezuire which I had too but I stop cause it made me unstable on feet I fell few times ...had Brian fog ...I blackout few times not worth it there other treatments for both never work on the pain
Worked great for my migraines but the side effects out weighed the pros. Tingling all over, loss of appetite, I couldn't taste and anything carbonated tasted flat, and on and off brain fog.

Pros:  50 mg Topamax per day seemed to make my 3-6 migraines per month shallower, shorter, and less painful.  I also lost weight - nice!  However, I stopped taking it after a year because it was making me too tired and depressed.
Definitely reduced my appetite, but for me it's absolutely worth it for the almost perfect migraine prevention.
I take it for MS-associated nerve pain, not diabetes, but the option wasn't there. Be careful about dosage, especially if you're taking with other meds that make you sleepy.

userStories.identifier: active young professional with no kids
userStories.tip: When I started taking Topamax I was only on 50mg a day but after being on it for over a year I need to take 100mg for it to work well for me.

I take it in the evening, since it makes me sleepy - and since I have to take it daily, at the same time, I just synced it with my birth control pill. Easy-peasy.

So far it's drastically reduced my migraines. Tingly feet, though.
Topamax reduces number of full blown migraines.  Results in low energy and slower mental functions.  Till have to take nine abortives each month.
userStories.identifier: 77 year old male with low energy.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: I took Topamax for a year for seizures. While it worked (I didn't have any seizures until I cut my dose myself), I was living in an endless brain fog. My family said I was like a zombie. I had no ambition or emotion.
Taking it in the evening helped with fatigue. Tingling was worth the decrease in migraines.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: This was the drug I will never use again for migraines. It doesn't work and has too many side effects.
I have been taking this medicine for a decade without any problems
Start with low dose but you have to increase over time
Felt absolutely terrible for first week on this stuff. After that, I felt completely normal again. Kick-started my stalled weight loss.
Took for 6 months for migraines. Had same amount of migraine if not more. Horrible pain in my arms. Severe brain fog. Couldn't stand the side effects even if the drug had worked.
userStories.identifier: Migraines over 20 years. High stress job
wife, happy, travel and enjoy friends
userStories.tip: take one at night, one in the morning

1-It will affect concentration so take at night
2- It will affect your kidneys so get bloodwork done regularly
3- It will affect your mood at high doses

drugs.name: Topamax

carousel_items_processed.orig: For the first week, avoid activities that require you to be alert.
Can cause tingling skin sensations and reduced appetite.
Report any confusion, decreased sweating, fever, or changes in behavior or vision.
Takes 3 to 4 weeks to feel full effects on mood.

risks_warnings.title: Suicidal thoughts or behavior
risks_warnings.description: Topamax may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Topamax may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Pregnancy
risks_warnings.description: Topamax may cause birth defects. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

description_processed.orig: Topamax may cause birth defects. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

risks_warnings.title: Uncontrolled body temperature
risks_warnings.description: Topamax can cause high body temperature and decreased sweating. Monitor your body temperature during strenuous exercise or exposure to high outside temperatures.

description_processed.orig: Topamax can cause high body temperature and decreased sweating. Monitor your body temperature during strenuous exercise or exposure to high outside temperatures.

risks_warnings.title: Mental changes due to high ammonia
risks_warnings.description: Topamax may cause increased ammonia in the body. Tell your doctor if you notice any confusion, weakness, or vomiting.

description_processed.orig: Topamax may cause increased ammonia in the body. Tell your doctor if you notice any confusion, weakness, or vomiting.

risks_warnings.title: Kidney stones
risks_warnings.description: Topamax may increase your risk for kidney stones. Stay well-hydrated to lower your risk.

description_processed.orig: Topamax may increase your risk for kidney stones. Stay well-hydrated to lower your risk.

risks_warnings.title: Vision problems
risks_warnings.description: Topamax can cause eye pain, blurry vision, or narrow vision. Vision problems can happen any time while taking this medication. Tell your doctor if you have any changes in your vision.

description_processed.orig: Topamax can cause eye pain, blurry vision, or narrow vision. Vision problems can happen any time while taking this medication. Tell your doctor if you have any changes in your vision.

risks_warnings.title: Withdrawal seizures
risks_warnings.description: Stopping Topamax suddenly can increase the number of seizures. If you want to stop taking Topamax, talk to your doctor before making any changes. Itâ€™s safer to slowly lower your dose of the drug over at least one week before completely stopping.

description_processed.orig: Stopping Topamax suddenly can increase the number of seizures. If you want to stop taking Topamax, talk to your doctor before making any changes. Itâ€™s safer to slowly lower your dose of the drug over at least one week before completely stopping.

surveys.question: Whatâ€™s your best coping strategy?
surveys.tip: I take my emergency meds with me everywhere, no matter where I'm going or for how long.

surveys.question: Besides medications, what else has worked for you?
surveys.tip: Nothing. Seriously, get meds or oxygen tanks or SOMETHING. You don't have to tough this crap out.

surveys.question: What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?
surveys.tip: Good luck, buddy. It's a hard condition to have, but you're strong just for getting through.
